property_id.description: property Identifier

check_in.description:
If present Max Hour allowed to Checkin 
-1: Flexible, 0-23: Hour of day

check_out.description:
If present Max Hour allowed to CheckOut
-1: Flexible, 0-23: Hour of day

give_best_price.description:
Give the best price to guests (true, false)
TRUE:  If the total amount(e.g. for 6 nights) is higher than the weekly price, use the weekly price instead of the nightly price.
FALSE: The nightly price should be used, even If the total amount (e.g. for 6 nights) is higher than the weekly price.

custom_days_rate.description: If set, then a rate for a custom period of days is defined on the RoomRates

min_stay.description: If set, defines the minimun days for a reservation

daily_price.description: If defined, is the daily price for the room

monday_price.description: If the rate has a diferent price for each day of the week, is the price for monday

tuesday_price.description: If the rate has a diferent price for each day of the week, is the price for tuesday

wednesday_price.description: If the rate has a diferent price for each day of the week, is the price for wednesday

thursday_price.description: If the rate has a diferent price for each day of the week, is the price for thursday

friday_price.description: If the rate has a diferent price for each day of the week, is the price for friday

saturday_price.description: If the rate has a diferent price for each day of the week, is the price for saturday

sunday_price.description: If the rate has a diferent price for each day of the week, is the price for sunday

weekly_price.description: If defined, is the weekly price for the room

monthly_price.description: If defined, is the monthly price for the room

custom_price.description: If defined is the custom days price for the room

charge_per_person_from.description: If defined indicates the number of people from wich a extra charge is charged (per person per night)

charge_per_person_value.description: If defined indicates the carge applied for extra guests (per person per night) starting at PerPersonFrom

charge_short_stay_days.description: If defined indicates the max number of days from below a extra charge is charged as a short stay

charge_short_stay_value.description: If defined indicates the carge applied for a short stay

get.description: Get the basic info for a given property

city.description: City name where the property is located

country.description: Country name where the property is located

has_addons.description: Boolean indicating if the property has available addons

price_unit_in_days.description:
Price unit in days. This field indicates the number of days of stay the MinPrice and MaxPrice are
So if we have a 30 PriceUnitInDays, it means the MinPrice and MaxPrice are Monthly prices
If multiple prices per diferent periods are defined it will return daily prices

get.description: Lists availability information for a given period for a specific room in a property of the calling user.

parameters.name: CombineRoomTypes
parameters.description: Get room type results totalized by house

parameters.name: BookingsOnly
parameters.description: Retrieve only booking information. Only valid for room type queries.

parameters.name: IncludeBookingIds
parameters.description: Retrieve booking Ids. Only valid for room type queries.

parameters.name: ModifiedSince
parameters.description:
Retrieve within the given period, only the sub-periods that were modified since the specified date up to 6 months before today.
Only valid for room type queries.

property_id.description: The property Identifier the availability period references to

period_end.description: Period ending date (is included in period)

total_units.description: Number of total units of this room type

total_overbooked.description: Number of total units overbooked for this room type

is_available.description: True if the period is not closed and there are units left unoccupied

booking_ids.description: List of Booking Ids on the period

closed_period_id.description: Closed Period Id for this period

status.description: Status of the Booking or Enquiry

source.description: Source of the booking or enquiry

external_id.description: Guest External Id in channels like Airbnb

arrival.description: Booking/Enquiry Arrival Date. In yyyy-MM-dd format

departure.description: Booking/Enquiry Departure Date. In yyyy-MM-dd format

people.description: The number of people (if any) the booking or enquiry references

property_id.description: The property Identifier (if any) the booking or enquiry references

property_name.description: The property Name (if any) the booking or enquiry references

key_code.description: KeyCode PIN to access to the property rented.

name.description: Name of the room type of the property

rooms.description: The list of rooms (if any) the booking or enquiry references

is_replied.description: bool value indicating if the booking/enquiry has been replied to the renter

is_deleted.description: Boolean indicating if the booking/enquiry is deleted and stored in the trash

date_deleted.description: If is a deleted booking/enquiry then the datetime of deletion, null otherwise

total_paid.description: Total amount paid for the booking/enquiry

amount_to_pay.description: Amount to pay for the booking/enquiry

thread_uid.description: Uid of the message thread the booking belongs to

euro_forex.description: Exchange rate between currency and Euro

parameters.name: from
parameters.description:
Optionally you can create a Booking from a Enquiry. We call this upgrade a enquiry.
            You still need to send all the booking information, but doing this way, all the messages will be saved on the new booking

requestBody.description: Object with the data for the new Booking should be a CreateBookingDto

source_text.description: Source Text for the booking

arrival.description: Arrival date with the format yyyy-MM-dd

departure.description: Departure date with the format yyyy-MM-dd

property_id.description: Property Identifier

key_code.description: KeyCode PIN to access to the property rented.

items.description: Represents a Booking Roomtype, with and identifier and the number of poeple in it

rooms.description: List of rooms booked

external_id.description: Guest External Id in channels like Airbnb

guest.description: Object used to create a Guest attached to a Boooking

send_notification.description: When Type is Owner, send a notification to guest via Email if configured in the recipient. If booking source is an external channel the message will be pushed. Settled to False by default for backward compatibility.

items.description: Object passed to create a attached message to the booking.

messages.description: List of messages attached to the booking. Optional

payment_type.description: (Obsolete. Use payment_website_id instead.) Payment type asociated with the booking. Optional, default value is None

payment_address.description: (Obsolete. Use payment_website_id instead.) Payment Address. Only if the Payment Type used supports it (eg. Paypal)

payment_website_id.description: Id of the website chosen as the payment gateway for this booking.

ip_created.description:
Optional. Ip from where the booking is created. 
If not provided will be used the Ip from where the API is called

total.description:
Total Amount for the booking, leave null to allow lodgify do his own Quote calculations. If something is passed 
then no calculations will be made. If a total value is defined, then a CurrencyCode should be defined.

currency_code.description: CurrencyCode for the Total Amount. If Total Amount is provided then this value has to be provided as well.

give_best_price.description:
Give the best price to guests (true, false)
TRUE:  If the total amount(e.g. for 6 nights) is higher than the weekly price, use the weekly price instead of the nightly price.
FALSE: The nightly price should be used, even If the total amount (e.g. for 6 nights) is higher than the weekly price.

sunday_price.description: If the rate has a diferent price for each day of the week, is the price for sunday

monthly_price.description: If defined, is the monthly price for the room

charge_per_person_value.description: If defined indicates the carge applied for extra guests (per person per night) starting at PerPersonFrom

charge_short_stay_days.description: If defined indicates the max number of days from below a extra charge is charged as a short stay

charge_short_stay_value.description: If defined indicates the carge applied for a short stay
